org.svvrl.goal.core.comp.waa
Class WAAConverter

java.lang.Object
  org.svvrl.goal.core.comp.waa.WAAConverter

public class WAAConverter
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides an implementation of the conversion from an NBW to a complement UCW (universal co-Büchi automaton) and the conversion from a UCW to an equivalent WAA (weak alternating automaton).

Author:
Yi-Wen Chang, ported by Ming-Hsien Tsai

Nested Class Summary
(package private) static class WAAConverter.UCW2WAAConverter
          Converts an alternating co-Büchi automaton to an equivalent weak alternating automaton, which is a special case of alternating Büchi automaton.

WAAConverter()

          Converts a universal co-Büchi word automaton (UCW) to an equivalent weak alternating automaton (WAA).

          Converts a universal co-Büchi word automaton (UCW) to an equivalent weak alternating automaton (WAA).

Method Detail

NBW2DualUCW

public static AltAutomaton NBW2DualUCW(FSA ba)
                                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Converts an NBW to a dual universal co-Büchi automaton.

Parameters:
ba - an NBW
Returns:
the dual co-Büchi alternating automaton with CNF style, that is, a UCW
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if ba is not an NBW

UCW2WAA

                            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Converts a universal co-Büchi word automaton (UCW) to an equivalent weak alternating automaton (WAA).

Parameters:
ucw - a universal co-Büchi word automaton (UCW)
Returns:
an equivalent weak alternating automaton (WAA)
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if ucw is not a UCW

UCW2WAA

protected static AltAutomaton UCW2WAA(AltAutomaton ucw,
                                      java.util.Hashtable<State,Pair<State,java.lang.Integer>> table)
                               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Converts a universal co-Büchi word automaton (UCW) to an equivalent weak alternating automaton (WAA).

Parameters:
ucw - a universal co-Büchi word automaton (UCW)
table - a store of the map from a state in ucw to a state in the returned WAA and a rank
Returns:
an equivalent weak alternating automaton (WAA)
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if ucw is not a UCW
